greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of the Sheffer triangle S2[3,2] given by A225466.
comment: This is a generalization of sequence A000587 because S2[3,2] = A225466 is a generalization of the Stirling2 triangle A048993.
For the row sums see A284864.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 10 2017
